title: Lambda to AppSync
description: Create a Lambda function that calls an AppSync GraphQL API

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This CDK application deploys a Lambda function and AppSync API. The amplify CLI `codegen` feature is used to create typescript code that the Lambda function uses to call the AppSync GraphQL API. A mutation called on the API triggers subscriptions.
See the Github repo for detailed instructions
